197947.「ハ…ハ～イ ミヤビちゃん！\n ひさしぶり～ 元気してた～？:
H...hey, Miyabi! Long time no see!
How you been?

197948.「オーイッ！ ミヤビっち～！\n 遊び人 やめたって聞いたけど ウソっしょ！？\:
Hey, hey! Miyabi! What's this about quitting
being a gadabout?! It's not true, is it?!
By the way, do you know that Deathwork guy?

197950.「仕事中だって 見たら わかるでしょ！\n デスワークなんて 知らないし～っ！\:
You can see that I'm working, can't you?! I
don't know anything about Deathwork! I stopped
that gadabout junk a long time ago!!

197951.「ガビィーン！！ オーッ ミヤビィーッ！\n アソビニン やめちまうなんて トン:
*GAAAAAAASP*! Oh, MIYABI!! You quit being a
gadabout?! That's OUTRAGEOUS!!

197952.「……マ？ マジっすか～？ 労働嫌いで有名な\n あの孤高のイタ映え女王 ミヤビ:
....Huh? Are you for realsies? The woman who notoriously loathes manual labor, the mischievous, pinteresting queen Miyabi...
What in the heck happened to her?!

197953.「……キッカケは ともかく～ッ アタシは\n 農家として生きていくことに 決めた:
...Regardless of how I got here, I decided to
become a farmer! I'm aware of the danger
of overworking myself!

197954.「最近は ぜんぜん寝てないくらい 働いてて～。\n もうまじ ハタケ中毒……って:
I've been working so, so hard lately... I'm
just so addicted...to farming! It's all I can
think about!!

197955.「……なのに～ ここんとこ ハタケの元気が\n ビミョーだから ガチで 手が離せ:
...but lately, something about my farming feels...off. It's kinda weird, so I really can't stop. So I have no time to talk with
any of you!

197956.「……そーゆーことだから\n 仕事のジャマ しないでくれる？\n ハナシは終わり:
...so can you please stop interrupting me and
my work? This conversation is OVER! Shoo!
So make like a fly, and buzz off!!

197957.「ミヤビちゃん…… ああは言ってたけど\n あんまり 楽しそーじゃなかったね～。:
Miyabi...even with all that stuff said, you
don't look very happy... Do you feel like
you have to do it, even if it's painful?

197958.「それなー。寝不足なのか しんどそーだった。\n あれが 労魔デスワークの仕業だ:
Yeah, you're right...she looks like she hasn't
slept in days. If this is Deathwork's doing,
then we gotta do something.

197960.「ミヤビっち 畑の元気がなくて\n 手が離せないって 言ってたよな。だったら\n:
Miyabi mentioned that her fields aren't doing
so hot and she couldn't just leave them. Let's
help her out with some fantastic fertilizer!

197961.「……で <pc>っち！\n ちと 悪いんだけど\n 肥料の件は ぜんぶ まかせ:
...So, uh... <pc>! Sorry, but you're
in charge of the fertilizer stuff!

197962.「えっ <pc>さんだけに まかせるんす？\n そりゃあ アゲアゲな <pc>さ:
Huh? You're gonna leave it to just them? Well,
this IS the energetic <pc> we're
talking about here...but what about US?

197963.「ヘヘッ そこはそれ。オレらには\n ちと 別件で やることがあるんだわ～。:
Heheh, don't you worry. We've got our own
stuff to take care of!

197964.「いいか～ この村の近くにある 知恵の社で\n 肥料のことを調べて バッチリ手に:
All righty, listen up! Go head over to the Shrine of Wisdom nearby and gather some info about fertilizers! Once you're done,
we'll meetcha where Miyabi is!

197965.「知恵の社は ツスクル平野の北西にあるぜ～。\n <pc>っち 肥料のことは シ:
The altar is located in the northwest Tsuskuru
Plains! Rest begards with that fertilizer!
We'll see ya soon!

197966.「……なにこれ？ このエナジーパウダーをまけば\n ハタケが 元気になるって？:
What is this supposed to be...? You're saying if I sprinkle this powder, it'll make my fields healthier? Get outta here! What the
heck would a gadabout like you know, anyway?!

197967.「……でも せっかく 持ってきてくれたなら\n ちょっとだけ 試してみよっかな。:
...but since you did go through all the
trouble of bringing it, I guess I'll try a
little bit of it.

197968.「……アタシ 最近 ハタケのこと わかるの。\n ハタケのバイブス…… ぐんぐん:
Lately I've been understanding my fields
more... These vibes...they're much more
lively! Looks like your fertilizer worked!

197969.「ひゅーっ！ さすがは <pc>っち！\n もう肥料を見つけて 畑にまいてくれた:
Phew! That's what I'm talking about,
<pc>! Looks like you managed to
find the fertilizer and try it out.

197970.「アハハ！ ミヤビっち～ 遅れてスマン。\n ちと 作るのに 手こずっちまってさ:
Ahahaha! Sorry I'm late, Miyabi... Took a
while to make this, but...here! A present
for you!

197972.「安眠香っつーお香！ 寝てないって言ってたろ？\n なんか ミヤビっち しんどそ:
It's a calming incense! You said you haven't been sleeping, right? I couldn't help but notice you looking sleepy. Working hard is
is cool, but a good night's sleep is even cooler!

197973.「はぁ～？ アンタたち さっきから\n 遊び人のクセして なんで やさしいの！？:
Seriously? You were acting all goofy before,
what's with all this being nice stuff? It's
hilarious, I really can't believe it!

197974.「……でも ありがたく 受け取っとく！\n チョー うれしい！ まじ ありがと！:
...buuut I'll gratefully accept it! Thank you,
really! I'm super happy!

197975.「<pc>さんに 肥料を頼んでる間に\n オレたちで 安眠香を作ってたんすよ～！:
While <pc> was taking care of the
fertilizer, the rest of us made that incense
for you! Man, what a doozy that was!

197976.「ルッチーさんは ペアレンツから教わって\n 調合の心得も あるんすわ！\n サ:
Lucchie learned how to mix stuff from his
parents! He whipped up that incense in no
time at all, it was nuts!

197977.「……あのさ。いろいろ 助けてもらったし？\n なんか お礼がしたいんだけど……:
....You know, you've really helped me out.
I'd like to thank you all, but...I haven't
even grown a single vegetable yet...

197978.「アハハッ！ 野菜も 気になるんだけどさ～\n オレっち ミヤビっちが 遊び人を:
Ahaha! Well, I AM curious about those vegetables, but what I really wanna know is why you stopped being a gadabout. Do
you mind telling me?

197979.「……ふーん。そんなのでイイなら 話したげる。\n でも じつは ハッキリ覚えて:
Hrrrm...if it's okay with you, then I'll tell
you. But, truth is...I can't remember the
exact reason...

197980.「それが……ある夜 突然 働きたくなったの。\n 遊び人とか まじムダだって 急:
And then...one night, I had the sudden urge to just work, and realized being a gadabout was just a waste of time. And by the next
day, I was already plowing fields.

197981.「ある夜……？ ミヤビっち。\n その日のこと くわしく 思いだせる？:
One night...? Miyabi...do you remember any
other details from that day?

197982.「……うーん。なんかぁ～\n 記憶が ボンヤリしてんだけどぉ～。:
Hmmm... I don't know...my memory's a bit
fuzzy...

197983.「あ～っ！ そういえば！ イタ映え絶景のこと\n 話した日があったじゃん！ 遊び:
Oh! Come to think of it, it was the day we talked about the pinteresting view! It was the same day I decided to quit, after meeting
you at the Gadabode!

197985.「そうだ……思いだした。\n そんで 遊びハウスに 寄った帰り道……\n 怪しげ:
That's right...I remember now. On my way home
from the Gadabode, I met quite the suspicious
looking duo...

197986.「……ピエロとバニーの格好をした ふたり組に。:
...they were a pair dressed as a clown and a
bunny.

197987.「……ピエロとバニーのふたり組？\n それが もしかして 労魔デスワーク……？:
A pair dressed like a clown and a bunny? Could
it be Deathwork's...?

197988.「ごめん。思いだせたのは ここまで。\n ……あんま 役に立たなそーだよね。:
Sorry...that's all I could remember. Probably
isn't much help...

197989.「いやいや～！ 充分だよ ミヤビっち。\n 忙しいとこ ジャマしたね。まじ 助か:
Oh, no, no! That's more than enough, Miyabi!
You helped us despite us bugging you!
Let us know when the veggies are ready!

197990.「<pc>っちも 肥料 サンキューな！\n ……とりま 今回の目的は果たせたし\:
<pc>, thanks for getting the
fertilizer! ...Well, now that we've achieved
our goal, let's all head back to the Gadabode!
